pasal krida upadeshakawarun, guruwun, pasal widuhalpathi thuma, adhyapana adhakshaka, adhyapana amathyansha lekham, ehama nathinam adhyapana amathithuma.

dan mema chithrapataye thibu apahadili sansiddhin kihipaya pilibandawa wimasa balamu.

awidyawa - mohaya nasemin pragnyawa diyunu wenawa.
kohoma hari api perala wadiyata eddi palamu bothalaye, mul bagaya ahawarayi.
mul jiwiya itha sarala bawa (bududahama – piligani / widyawa – piligani )
anith athata jalaya basa yame di niwaradi aakarayata, jalaya eka thana no randi aarakshitha pahath bim kara basa yana aakarayata kanu paddhathi sakas kirima da awashyamaya.
